conclusion: A drives in towards several groups of blocks of different colors.
Determine which blocks A will collide with and the final stop position.
A is approaching a red cube.

premise: A is approaching a red cube.
A first collides with the red square on the driving path.
conclusion: The red cube is lighter, so it is pushed aside while the truck continues along nearly the same line, slowed a little but still moving.
A is approaching a blue cube.

premise: The slowed truck now lines up with, and bumps into, the next nearest obstacle – the blue cube.
A collides with the blue cube.
conclusion: The truck pushes the blue cube aside while losing more speed.
A is approaching a yellow cube.

premise: By the time the truck meets the yellow cube its speed is low.
A collides with the yellow cube.
conclusion: The final collision robs it of the remaining kinetic energy and it stops just past that cube.
